Firedrill kept on moving as fast as he could, without making the ride
uncompfortable, but he almost ran into the stopped Beachcomber. "What is
it?" he asked, as Beachcomber transformed and stood up. Then Firedrill
realized he didnt need an explanation, as he could hear massive
explosions close by. All he could think was that Cliffjumper was in
danger, as he roared around Beachcomber, and towards the danger, while
Beachcomber yelled something about needing a plan.
